sentences.english: I visited the annual Ice and Snow festival.

sentences.english: With the arrival of winter, the snow and ice would help to cover the pipeline.
sentences.chinese: 随着冬天的来临，冰雪会将管道遮盖住。

sentences.english: The easternmost reaches of the Russian Federation, blanketed in snow and ice, appear in the upper left corner of this image.
sentences.chinese: 在这张图片的左上方是被冰雪覆盖的俄罗斯的最东端。

sentences.english: Then, as the warm winds chase away snow and ice, new life begins.
sentences.chinese: 然后，当暖风吹破冰雪，新生降临。

sentences.english: The spring snow melt, all things recovery, 10000 Purple Yan-hong, to give hope.

sentences.english: Red leaves in autumn and snow in winter.

sentences.chinese: 他把冰雪披戴在在肩膀，他是孤傲的末代王爵。

sentences.english: Valoran's easternmost pole is bitterly cold and covered in ice.
sentences.chinese: 在瓦罗兰的最东面，是被冰雪覆盖的寒冷极地。

sentences.english: Spring coming, the cold melt, the white goes to the deep inside.
sentences.chinese: 春来了，大地暖，冰雪融化沁入深深的枝干。

sentences.english: And the frigid climate bestows Heilongjiang rich resources of ice and snow.
sentences.chinese: 寒冷的气候赋予了其得天独厚的冰雪资源。

sentences.english: China has an ice festival each year.
If the snow-like passion, and loneliness and, of course, a little warm.

sentences.english: People look at a giant white tiger set up for the Daegwallyeong Snow Festival in Pyeongchang, South Korea.
sentences.chinese: 韩国平昌的冰雪节上，人们正在看着一尊虎冰雕。

sentences.english: Particularly prominent projects is the snow and ice back-up personnel training issues.
sentences.chinese: 尤显突出的就是冰雪项目后备人才培养的问题。

sentences.english: A woman slides down an ice slide at the Harbin International Ice and Snow Festival.
sentences.chinese: 在哈尔滨国际冰雪节上，一名女子从冰雕上滑下。
